title: The Guiding Light of Peggy Roberts
summary: Peggy Roberts, a 22-year-old with a passion for guiding and advising, discovers her ability to foresee consequences and uses it to prevent disasters over a week, ultimately embracing her role as a community protector.
summaryGerman: Peggy Roberts, eine 22-jährige mit einer Leidenschaft für Führung und Beratung, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, Konsequenzen vorherzusehen und verwendet diese, um Katastrophen über eine Woche hinweg zu verhindern und akzeptiert letztendlich ihre Rolle als Beschützerin der Gemeinschaft.
summaryDutch: Peggy Roberts, een 22-jarige met een passie voor leidinggeven en adviseren, ontdekt haar vermogen om gevolgen te voorzien en gebruikt dit om rampen te voorkomen gedurende een week, uiteindelijk haar rol als gemeenschapsbeschermer omarmend.
summaryFrench: Peggy Roberts, une jeune femme de 22 ans passionnée par le guidage et le conseil, découvre sa capacité à prévoir les conséquences et l'utilise pour éviter les désastres pendant une semaine, finalement en acceptant son rôle de protectrice de la communauté.

story.text: Peggy feels an unusual surge of energy as she predicts a major electrical fault at her office building and guides the evacuation, preventing injuries.
While feeling somewhat eerie, Peggy foresees a traffic mishap and advises a neighbor to take a different route, later hearing the accident on the news.
Peggy feels romantic as she unexpectedly advises a friend on a relationship matter, which leads to a beautiful reconciliation.
Feeling triumphant, Peggy prevents a financial crisis at a local charity by foreseeing the outcomes of a risky investment and advising against it.
As a peaceful mood settles in, Peggy uses her gift to mediate a community dispute, resulting in a harmonious resolution.
Feeling epic, Peggy discovers a plot against the local park and orchestrates a campaign that saves the area from development.
Ending her week feeling happy, Peggy reflects on her actions, realizing her true potential and embracing her new role as a guiding superhero.

ending: With her newfound powers and a heart to guide, Peggy Roberts stood as a beacon of hope and wisdom in her community.
moral: Embracing one's unique abilities can lead to profound impacts, not just for oneself but for the whole community.
